name: Minigame Madness (itch)
description:
Try to reach a score of 20 beating all minigames in different speeds and difficulties!
  • 2 frenetic gamemodes
  • 8+ different minigames
  • 3 speed levels
  • 3 difficulty levels
Assets used:

Art - Kenney's Bit Pack

Music and SFX - OpenGameArt

If you are having trouble running the game in your browser, try another browser (Chrome can sometimes block some resources) or download the game.
